scenario_text.value: There, that should do it.
Kew! Kewkewkew!
Kunemon? What is it?

Hey, don’t mess that stuff up! I just
finished packing it!
Kew...
Wait, are you saying you’re hungry?
Kewkew!

Here, why don’t you have some of this? Um, do
you even eat beans?
Kewkewkew!
I guess so.
G’morning. Everyone’s up so early.

You’re finally up?
So relaxed before the battle?
Leave me alone. That’s not it.
Well, I wouldn’t worry about you anyway.

It’s Haru and Miyuki.
Morning.
Yikes!
Morning...

And they’re gone. The two of them never seem
to want to hang around.
*huff*...*huff*...

What is it, Ryo?
You look really pale!
Kewkew?
No, well... Yeah.

Listen, Takuma. I gotta tell you this. I’m
not really getting along with Haru.

First impressions gone wrong?
When you thought he was a ghost?
Forget that!
It’s not like that at all...
What do you mean?
Umm... Well...

(What is it? Why is he suddenly all afraid of
Haru?)

(It’s probably just a misunderstanding.
Haru is such a little kid, too.)

(Should I tell him to relax? Or should
I tease him like Minoru does?)
(What should I say to Ryo?)
Did something happen?
Some misunderstanding?
Such a scaredy-cat.
Did something happen?
Did something happen with you and Haru?

Um...
I guess you could say that.

Do you remember at the radio tower when
Arukenimon dropped me from the bridge?

Haru was with me then, and I think he saved
my life...
Haru? That little kid? How?

No clue... I had passed out.
But that’s not all.

He... Back then he really looked down on
me...

He’s just a kid, but when he stared at me
with that icy look on his face...

(There are definitely times when Haru sounds
more like an adult...)

(A stare enough to frighten Ryo?
I can’t even imagine...)

I don’t really need you to believe me.
I sometimes think it had to be a dream.

But now I can’t help but be scared of Haru
still.
Some misunderstanding?

I don’t know what happened but I’m sure it’s
just a misunderstanding.
No. Way!

Well, actually...you might be right.
That’s gotta be it.

There’s no way a kid could stare like that.
It was almost inhuman, that stare...

But maybe Haru isn’t human?
Is he a monster, or some kind of creature?
Ryo? Ryo!
Right? I mean, right?
You okay? You’re sweating like crazy!

What? Of course I’m okay! I guess I just
needed to talk it out with someone.
What? Really?
(And now he looks even worse.)
Such a scaredy-cat.

Such a scaredy-cat, Ryo!
Afraid of such a little kid?
I ain’t scared!

But hang on? You’re pretending to be Minoru?
Your imitation sucks...
I’m sorry...

Yeah... It’s so stupid.
I need to ignore that kid.
But I am totally not scared!
All right, fine! I get it!
Kewkewww!
Kunemon? You messed up our stuff again?

Start all over again...
Kunemon, help me this time!
Kewww!
Kunemon did that on purpose.
Really?
To make Ryo forget his fears.

So...a distraction?
Kunemon’s pretty bright!

(But wait. Does that mean Kunemon wanted us
to stop talking about Haru?)

(Nah. Let’s not overthink it.
It’s nearly time to fight.)

(Ryo and Kunemon are packing now.
He seems to have forgotten his fears.)
